person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: China controlled most of the match and saw several chances missed until the 78th minute when Uzbek striker Igor Shkvyrin took advantage of a misdirected defensive header to lob the ball over the advancing Chinese keeper and into an empty net .

Let's think step by step.

In this paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Person":

1. Igor Shkvyrin - Uzbek striker
2. Chinese keeper - Chinese goalkeeper
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Of course! Here are the entities that clearly refer to "Person" in the paragraph:

1. Igor Shkvyrin - Uzbek striker

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities that refer to "Person" in the paragraph:

| Person |
| --- |
| Igor Shkvyrin |

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: China controlled most of the match and saw several chances missed until the 78th minute when Uzbek striker Igor Shkvyrin took advantage of a misdirected defensive header to lob the ball over the advancing Chinese keeper and into an empty net .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Location" entities in the paragraph:

1. China - This is the location of the match, as the paragraph states that China controlled most of the match.
2. Uzbekistan - This is the location of the Uzbek striker Igor Shkvyrin, who scored the goal.
3. Empty net - This is the location where the ball went into the net after Shkvyrin lobbed it over the Chinese keeper.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

Of course! Here are the "Location" entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. China
2. Uzbekistan

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Location" entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

| Location |
| --- |
| China |
| Uzbekistan |
